speaker: menu
msg: Welcome to Wanderer! A text-based adventure through our Solar System!

speaker: menu
msg: Created for HPS351 as a final project in spring 2021.| - daphii |

speaker: menu

speaker: menu
msg: Thank you for playing!|Have a nice day :)

speaker: nar
msg: You hear the sound of the crackling radio in your helmet...

speaker: nar
msg: Ground launch sequencer is go for auto sequence start...

speaker: nar
msg: Activate launch pad sound suppression system...

speaker: nar
msg: Activate main engine hydrogen burnoff system...

speaker: nar
msg: You are pressed back into your seat under the increasing g-force...

speaker: nar
msg: The sound of your heart beating drowns out the radio chatter...

speaker: nar
msg: Your body grows heavy, your vision darkens around the edges...
